item.title: Roswell Dance Theatre presents The Little Mermaid
item.description:
Friday, April 4, 2025
Join mermaid princess Ariel on her journey to land and life above the sea. Surrounded by her sea friends, she glimpses the world at the edge of the water, and makes a deal with sea witch Ursula, and overcomes struggles to win the love of Prince Eric and find the life she desires.

item.title: Wild Roots Nursery Native Plant Sale
item.description:
Saturday, April 5, 2025
Come find the best native plants for planting in your garden this spring! Wild Roots Native Nursery strives to make native plants widely available and has a great selection of plants for sun and shade! Visit the City's website for more information.

item.title: Lantern Parade 2025
item.description:
Saturday, April 5, 2025
The Lantern Parade is an evening filled with fantastical puppets and glowing lanterns! Families bring handcrafted lanterns, celebrate as the sun sets, then parade together down to the Chattahoochee River.

item.title: Graham Nash
item.description:
Sunday, April 6, 2025
Legendary artist Graham Nash, as a founding member of both the Hollies and Crosby, Stills and Nash, is a two-time Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductee. Graham will be joined on stage by his band, performing favorites from across his sixty-year career!

item.title: PBS Kids Story Time, April 2025
item.description:
Monday, April 7, 2025
You and your little ones (ages 2-6) will enjoy stories, songs, rhymes and a craft, and a special PBS KIDS show in the Studio Theatre Lobby. Plan to join us the first Monday of each month!

item.title: City Green Live: Tonic
item.description:
Friday, April 11, 2025
Since 1996, the GRAMMY® Award-nominated multi-platinum trio has consistently delivered anthemic and undeniable rock fashioned from eloquent songcraft, lyrical honesty, and unshakable melodies.

item.title: Sandy Springs Farmers Market 2025
item.description:
Saturday, April 12, 2025
The Sandy Springs Farmers Market, located on the Green at City Springs, is on Saturdays April - November, rain or shine, 8:30 a.m. - noon. Enjoy an open-air shopping environment with vendors offering fresh produce and artisan foods; many offer pre-orders.

item.title: Dino Egg Hunt for Kids with Disabilities
item.description:
Saturday, April 12, 2025
During the fifth annual Dino Egg Hunt, the lawn at Morgan Falls Overlook Park will be dotted with dino-inspired eggs and additional themed activities. Visit the City's website to learn more.

item.title: Gallery at City Springs - Clay Fisher
item.description:
Wednesday, April 16, 2025
Visit the Gallery at City Springs for the current exhibit featuring local photographer Clay Fisher and his "For the Birds" project. Meet the artist at a reception on Wednesday, April 16 from 6-8 p.m. in the City Hall lobby.

item.title: Optimist Club's Easter Egg Hunt
item.description:
Saturday, April 19, 2025
Hop into the Fun at The Annual Optimist Club Egg Hunt! Join us for an egg-citing adventure filled with candy, prizes, and fun! Visit the City's website for more information.

item.title: Astronomy Club - April Event
item.description:
Saturday, April 19, 2025
Attention Star Gazers! It's time for the Atlanta Astronomy Club's monthly meeting at Lost Corner Preserve. These monthly meetings are free and open to all levels of experience, and each meeting ends with a stargazing session! Learn more at the City's website.

item.title: City Nature Challenge
item.description:
Friday, April 25, 2025
Join the City Nature Challenge and get outside to explore nature in your own backyard, local greenspace, or any of the City's parks! This self-guided program allows you to contribute to Citizen Science by using the iNaturalist app. Visit the City's website to learn more.

item.title: World Tai Chi and Qigong Day
item.description:
Saturday, April 26, 2025
Tai Chi is a practice of calm, strength, and balance, and whether you're a seasoned practitioner or new to the practice, this is your chance to experience its transformative power. Visit the City's website to learn more.

item.title: Feathered Friends
item.description:
Saturday, May 3, 2025
Wish you had a greater knowledge of the birds that call your backyard home? Spring is a perfect time to learn about all the migratory and full-time feathered friends that live and pass through Sandy Springs. Visit the City's website to learn more.

item.title: Hoops at Hammond 3v3 Basketball Tournament
item.description:
Saturday, May 3, 2025
Join us at Hammond Park for a day of hoops, community, and great vibes. Visit the City's website for more information.

item.title: Concerts by the Springs: Ansley Stewart Band
item.description:
Sunday, May 4, 2025
Echoing the halls of the 1960s soul singers with the most powerful gospel depth, combined with the Athens, GA college radio waves of the 1980s, sits an eclectic, thoughtful, and passionate voice that is Ansley Stewart.

item.title: Sandy Spring Crafting Buddies
item.description:
Wednesday, May 7, 2025
Join the Sandy Springs Crafting Buddies for an evening of social crafting. Bring your current work in progress, or materials to start a new project and come hang with us! Visit the City's website for more information.

item.title: Sundown Social 2025
item.description:
Thursday, May 8, 2025
Sundown Social is a relaxed, neighborhood gathering with live music, yard games, and signature cocktails. Meet your neighbors in City Springs!

item.title: Mother Son Dance - Employee Discount
item.description:
Saturday, May 10, 2025
For the fifth year in a row, the City is offering families a Mother’s Day weekend event to celebrate the very special mom (or mother figure) in our younger residents’ lives. Employee discount available!

item.title: Mother Son Dance
item.description:
Saturday, May 10, 2025
For the fifth year in a row, the City is offering families a Mother’s Day weekend event to celebrate the very special mom (or mother figure) in our younger residents’ lives.

item.title: National Kids to Parks Day
item.description:
Saturday, May 17, 2025
Join National Park Trust, Buddy Bison, and kids across America for a fun day of outdoor play! Visit one of the City's beautiful parks! Learn more on the City's website.

enclosure.url: https://live-unified-platform.pantheonsite.io/sites/default/files/styles/w1088_16_9/public/2025-02/2023 Kids to Parks Web Asset - REV 1.00.jpg

item.title: Astronomy Club - May meeting
item.description:
Saturday, May 17, 2025
Attention Star Gazers! It's time for the Atlanta Astronomy Club's monthly meeting. These meetings are free and open to all levels of experience. Each month offers a different topic, and each meeting ends with a stargazing session! Visit the City's website to learn more.

item.title: City Green Live: Face 2 Face
item.description:
Friday, May 23, 2025
Face 2 Face is an electrifying tribute band that pays homage to two iconic piano legends, Elton John and Billy Joel.

item.title: The Finale 2025
item.description:
Saturday, May 31, 2025
The Finale is a show dedicated to highlighting the year-long work of The Performance Division at Elite Studios. It's the exciting culmination of a year’s worth of growth and training for our dancers.

item.title: Concerts by the Springs: Funk Force Five
item.description:
Sunday, June 1, 2025
Playing all of your favorite hits from the 60’s to today, from James Taylor to Taylor Smith, Funk Force Five will get you out of your seat and on to the dance floor with classic and current jams!

item.title: Sandy Spring Crafting Buddies
item.description:
Wednesday, June 4, 2025
Join the Sandy Springs Crafting Buddies for an evening of social crafting. Bring your current work in progress, or materials to start a new project and come hang with us! Visit the City's website for more information.

item.title: Food That Rocks 2025
item.description:
Thursday, June 5, 2025
Party with a purpose at City Springs for a tasting experience like no other, celebrating Sandy Springs restaurants. Enjoy food, wine, beer, and cocktail tastings plus live music, chef demonstrations, and more!

item.title: City Green Live: September in the Park
item.description:
Friday, June 13, 2025
September In The Park is the ultimate Earth, Wind & Fire and Chicago tribute – Combining the incredible horn arrangements and vocal harmonies that both groups are known for, September In The Park offers a one of a kind entertainment experience!

item.title: Astronomy Club - June meeting
item.description:
Saturday, June 14, 2025
​​​​Attention Star Gazers! It's time for the Atlanta Astronomy Club's monthly meeting. These meetings are free and open to all levels of experience. Each month offers a different topic, and each meeting ends with a stargazing session! Visit the City's website to learn more.

item.title: ASO: The Music of John Williams
item.description:
Sunday, June 15, 2025
Relive the adventures of your favorite film characters through the power of a live orchestra performance! The Atlanta Symphony Orchestra fills Byers Theatre with the masterful film music of John Williams, who scored Star Wars, Jurassic Park, the Harry Potter series, and more.

item.title: Juneteenth Celebration
item.description:
Thursday, June 19, 2025
The Juneteenth Celebration will include educational activities and more! This family-friendly event is free and open to the public.

item.title: Astronomy Club - June Stargazer Event
item.description:
Saturday, June 28, 2025
Attention Star Gazers! It's time for the Atlanta Astronomy Club's monthly event. The Atlanta Astronomy Club (AAC) is one of the largest organizations of beginner and amateur astronomers in the southeastern United States. Visit the City's website to learn more.

item.title: Sandy Spring Crafting Buddies
item.description:
Wednesday, July 2, 2025
Join the Sandy Springs Crafting Buddies for an evening of social crafting. Bring your current work in progress, or materials to start a new project and come hang with us! Visit the City's website for more information.

item.title: Stars & Stripes 2025
item.description:
Friday, July 4, 2025
Celebrate Independence Day, July 4

enclosure.url: https://live-unified-platform.pantheonsite.io/sites/default/files/styles/w1088_16_9/public/2023-05/2023 Stars and Stripes Website Image - REV 1.0_0.jpg
